**As a** [student]  
 **I need** [to understand]  
 **So that** [I can use it later]  
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [I'm just learning]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [the next exercises]
 When [I can finish them]
 Then [I can say I learned]
 ```
